start message:
A walking skeleton of a man, sword in hand, emerges from the darkness. 
THE SKELETON attacks you.

moves.name: monster_unarmedattack_noguard
moves.text: THE SKELETON lurches and slices you across the side. The scratch stings.

moves.name: monster_unarmedattack_guard
moves.text: THE SKELETON hits you slightly, but your guard protects you.

moves.name: monster_armedattack_noguard
moves.text:
THE SKELETON swings its sword and leaves a huge gash in your chest. 
Blood drips from the wound.

moves.name: monster_armedattack_guard
moves.text: THE SKELETON strikes and its weapon clashes against yours, but your guard protects you.

moves.name: monster_prepareattack
moves.text: THE SKELETON readies its sword, about to attack.

moves.name: monster_defend
moves.text: THE SKELETON steps back and seems to put its arms forward, anticipating an attack.

moves.name: loss_message
moves.text:
THE SKELETON charges you, and pierces its sword in a clean blow straight through your stomach. 
This is the end.

weapons.name: sword
weapons.armedattack_prepared: You slash your enemy with your sword.
weapons.armedattack_unprepared: Your sword is heavy, raise it before you strike!
weapons.endingtext:
You slash the monster one last time, and it falls to the ground.
Victory is yours.

weapons.name: the flame scepter
weapons.armedattack_prepared: The scepter blasts a vortex of fire at your enemy from its head, illuminating the whole dungeon.
weapons.armedattack_unprepared: The scepter must be charged before you can attack!
weapons.prepare: The orange plasma in the orb at the tip dances, hums, and shines brighter. You can feel its energy shaking the staff.
weapons.endingtext:
The fire engulfs your enemy, and they lay there still, skin blackened and scorched after it subsides. 
Victory is yours.

weapons.name: gungnir
weapons.armedattack_prepared: You take aim and throw gungnir, and it seems as if Odin itself guides the spear to target.
weapons.armedattack_unprepared: You must take aim before you attack!
weapons.prepare: You raise gungnir over your shoulder and prepare to strike.
weapons.endingtext:
You aim between your enemy's eyes, and the spear finds its place as Norse legend told. 
Victory is yours.

weapons.name: mjolnir
weapons.armedattack_prepared: You throw mjolnir and a blinding crack of lightning strikes your enemy as it flies at them.
weapons.armedattack_unprepared: Mjolnir is heavy, and takes strength to throw.
weapons.prepare: You raise mjolnir, and thunder reverberates throughout the cavern. The hair on your arms begin to stand up from the static.
weapons.endingtext:
With a final thunderous boom, your enemy falls to the ground. 
Victory is yours.

weapons.name: the scythe of cronus
weapons.armedattack_prepared: You swing the scythe and inflict a gaping wound upon your enemy.
weapons.armedattack_unprepared: The scythe is heavy and takes great strength to wield.
weapons.prepare: You carefully look for an opening as you prepare the scythe for another strike.
weapons.endingtext:
With one final swing of the scythe, you decapitate your foe. 
Victory is yours.
